name: Block breaker (m00ns7ruck)
description: The game is a remake of arkanoid / breakout, made in Unity 2019.3.2f1, with learning purposes. The font used for the headings is Old Block by Vid the Kid. The background image is taken from WallpaperCave. The sprites of the blocks are taken from opengameart.org, author: bevouliin.com The audio effects are made by me in LMMS.
